thread.title: Re: ‘Infuriating and unacceptable’: Photo of veteran in pain at VA hospital causes outrage
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Infuriating and unacceptable’: Photo of veteran in pain at VA hospital causes outrage

author: Luv2GoFly
title: Re: ‘Infuriating and unacceptable’: Photo of veteran in pain at VA hospital causes outrage
text:
Still digging? Chris Cuomo appalls with this take on 12-year-old girls (and their parents) 
Blaine Tolison spoke with Stephen McMenamin, a former U.S. Marine, whose wife took the photos and posted them to Facebook. 
He said a veteran on the ground was using his bag of medication for a pillow after being denied an available reclining chair. 
“The nurse started yelling at him, telling him he can’t do that. He’s like, ‘I can’t get up and I won’t get up. I will be here until you can see me. Can I please have a blanket?’” McMenamin said. 
Here’s video of a news report on the photo: @wsbtv That is infuriating and unacceptable.
